snippet: The Foreign Ministry suggests that if the Palestinians succeed in winning enhanced status at the United Nations, Israel may cancel the Oslo peace accords and move to oust the Palestinian president, Mahmoud Abbas.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry suggests that if the Palestinians succeed in winning enhanced status at the United Nations, Israel may cancel the Oslo peace accords and move to oust the Palestinian president, Mahmoud Abbas.

headline.seo: Israel Heightens Warnings Over Palestinians’ U.N. Bid
headline.main: Israel Heightens Warnings Over Palestinians’ U.N. Bid
headline.print_headline: Israel Heightens Warnings Over Palestinians’ U.N. Bid
